name: Amazing Bagan Resort

reviews.text: We spent two nights in the four star Bagan Golf Resort, located at the NE edge of the monumental area, close to the airport and about three km S of Nyaung U. With large gardens and a good pool, this spacious hotel is a peaceful and well managed retreat from the bustle of the nearby towns and the enervating heat of the Bagan plain. As it’s several km from most of the key sites, a car is needed but this is the case in practice for any serious visit to the area, wherever located. Rooms are large and adequately furnished but look a little tired. The food is adequate if unexciting and the staff are efficient and very friendly.
reviews.title: Peaceful retreat
Loved this hotel.
reviews.text: Recommended for those who don’t need to sample the night life of New Bagan and Nyuang U.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great resort in Bagan, not far from anywhere, quick trip from airport and only 20 minutes to most temples by bicycle. Very reasonable price for a fantastic clean room, friendly and helpful service, lovely environment, great pool, complimentary bicycle usage, etc. We had to leave early for our plane on the last day before the regular breakfast hours so they prepared a hot breakfast box for us to take.
reviews.title: Wonderful Oasis in Bagan, great value/service/location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Make sure to bring good quality US$ bills (new or close to new) anything torn, worn, marked, etc. will not be accepted. The exchange rate at the hotel was 850 Kyat per 1 US$ which was not a very good rate but in Bagan we couldn't find much better.
reviews.title: A charming hotel in local burmese style

reviews.text: Double check the bicycles before you take off for the day, we ended up needing to have 1 repaired during our ride, luckily there are lots of bike repair shops around (bike repair shop = 1 guy, and a few tools).
reviews.title: Pleasent and kindness

reviews.text: At 5 a.m. two people were already waiting in front of our room to collect the luggage.
reviews.title: COMFORTABLY NICE

reviews.text: For our boat trip to Mandalay they gave us a breakfast box.
reviews.title: Loved it!
BEST IN BAGAN?
reviews.text: Having stayed at the Amazing Hotel in Ngapali (lovely beach resort) we were pleased to book in to the Amazing in Bagan. Same nice, cheerful staff, extremely helpful, nice rooms, pleasant restaurant - and a swimming pool with loungers.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: People come to Bagan principally for its extraordinary Temples, scattered over a very wide area within a few miles of the hotel. It's easy to take a taxi to explore them (not all as you'd need a week, and soon be pagoded-out), but to see a good selection, and climb up them (some have staircases, some don't).
reviews.title: A tranquil and luxurious resort, highly recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Obviously most people are just staying 2/3 nights on their tour of Myanamar, so it's a come and go hotel - but very nicely run, and the keen staff make your stay most enjoyable.
reviews.title: Great hotel with friendly service in an isolated location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: -Excellent service, very friendly and helpful staff
reviews.title: Highly Recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: -Location is a bit far away from everything, but that makes it very, very quiet
reviews.title: Amazing indeed!

reviews.text: This is an excellent hotel with a great restaurant - elegant front lobby and rooms at the suite level. The complimentary outdoor breakfast was very good - excellent ambiance with good customer service and focus.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel - strongly recommended

reviews.text: They upgraded me to a suite due to minor difficulties in the room --- the duty manager and his staff responded immediately though i offered to stay in the room when the a/c difficulties were fixed. Threw in a free 8 or 10 course dinner for one of the two nights I stayed there.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel at a great price in Bagan

reviews.text: Bagan with its 4000+ pagodas from the 11th - 13th century was a delight. Strongly recommended especially a sunset view from one of the taller pagodas.
reviews.title: Unbeatable Value for Money in Bagan

reviews.text: Overall, all visitors to Myanmar should remember to bring crisp, totally unmarked, preferably unused dollar bills as the slightest of creases/folds, pen markings, ink stains makes it extremely difficult to be used. Currency conversion is a major issue because of these circumstances peculiar/particular to Myanmar.
reviews.title: Very nice staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Internet connections in Myanmar are slow and spotty for obvious reasons.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel ! Perfect Stay

description: Amazing Bagan Resort is located adjacent to the Bagan Nyaung Oo Golf Club. 10 minutes away from Old Bagan and most of the sightseeing points. Only 5 minutes from the Bagan Nyaung Oo Airport.The Amazing Bagan Resort promises each guest with unsurpassed ambiance and personalized service altered to the individual's needs.
